thread.title: Morrissey says he's really coming to Houston this time

author: chron.com
title: Morrissey says he's really coming to Houston this time

(Barbara Livingston / Special to the Times Union) Image 93 of 93 Morrissey says he's really coming to Houston this time 1 / 93 Back to Gallery Let's try this again, shall we?
Morrissey says he's really, truly coming to Houston this time. A new date is scheduled for April 14 at White Oak Music Hall.
Tickets go on sale at 10 a.m. Friday.
CALLED OFF: Morrissey cancels Houston show, other dates in December
He previously canceled a Dec. 16 date at the venue, blaming financial management .
That was after canceling a Nov. 19 date after his keyboardist collapsed in Boulder, Co.
Perhaps, as the saying goes, the third time will be the charm.
We'll see.
BAKERSFIELD, California (AP) — Willie Nelson has postponed three California shows because of illness. Publicist Elaine Schock tells The Associated Press that Nelson will have to miss his three-night stint that had been scheduled for Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday at Buck Owens' Crystal Palace in Bakersfield. Schock gave no details on Nelson's sickness, but she says he plans to be back on the road again for a Feb. 16 concert at a San Antonio rodeo.
Media: MediaOS Video >>>Scroll through the above gallery to see other concerts coming to Houston this year
